summary: This overhauls the look of the Sleeping Giant Inn in Riverwood.
descriptionHtml: After a long time in Skyrim, I thought to myself whether I could implement my own idea of how I wanted the inns to look like in Skyrim so this is my first recreation of the well known Sleeping Giant Inn located in RIverwood. After countless hours thinking of how I could make the Inn look better I was able to just mash up different parts of architecture to recreate a more....how I would say pulchritudinous.Â pulchritudinous means physically beautiful and this was my thought when I created this mod. This mod is based around the name Sleeping Giant and as we know giants do love their mammoths. So the whole skeleton of the mammoth and the book is about a great beast called Ragnarok and his supposedly interesting life. Comment as much as you can because I really want to receive as much feedback as I can so that I make it better in[url=#] future[img]http://cdncache-a.akamaihd.net/items/it/img/arrow-10x10.png[/img][/url] updates. Even endorse if you feel like it.
author: RGX
